Francesco Foltran General Manager and Director of Resources and Development Network Base.exib Design Tm

Sourced from Steel-mechanical Industry, Francesco Foltran debuted in 2003 with responsibility activities in the management of human resources for Companies of primary importance in the Italian Insurance and Financial panorama, covering major positions in Development and Training, Marketing, and in the Banking sector. Careful observer of mutations Socio-contemporary consumer and information technology in IBM area, plays its professional and managerial activities within the International Network Base.exib Design Tm, which has a substantial membership fee.
